name: Natural Grocers by Vitamin Cottage, Inc.
description: Natural Grocers by Vitamin Cottage, Inc. is a leading retailer of natural and organic groceries, dietary supplements, and personal care products. Founded in 1955 in Colorado by Margaret and Philip Isely, the company has built a strong reputation for providing high-quality products at affordable prices. Natural Grocers focuses on offering organic produce, grass-fed meats, and a wide selection of vitamins and supplements, catering to health-conscious consumers. The company is committed to promoting a healthy lifestyle through nutrition education and community engagement. With over 160 stores across 20 states, Natural Grocers aims to make organic and natural products accessible to everyone, providing a shopping experience that emphasizes sustainability and wellness. The company's mission is to help customers achieve their health goals by providing them with the resources and knowledge necessary to make informed dietary choices. Natural Grocers also prioritizes environmental stewardship by sourcing products from sustainable suppliers and minimizing waste within its operations. Their dedicated team of nutrition educators offers free classes and consultations to empower customers in their health journeys, reinforcing the company's belief that education is key to making informed choices about nutrition and wellness.

seo.meta_title: Natural Grocers | Organic Groceries and Health Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Natural Grocers, your go-to retailer for natural and organic groceries, dietary supplements, and personal care products. Committed to health and sustainability.

faq.question: What does Natural Grocers offer?
faq.answer: Natural Grocers offers a wide range of organic groceries, dietary supplements, and personal care products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Natural Grocers?
faq.answer: Kemper Isely is the CEO of Natural Grocers by Vitamin Cottage, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Natural Grocers headquartered?
faq.answer: Natural Grocers is headquartered in Lakewood, Colorado, USA.
